text: The Shaggy Dog is a 1959 Walt Disney movie. It stars Fred MacMurray, Tommy Kirk, Kevin Corcoran, and Annette Funicello. It is based on the story, The Hound of Florence by Felix Salten. It was Disney's first live-action movie. A sequel was made in 1976 called The Shaggy D.A. which stars Dean Jones, Tim Conway, and Suzanne Pleshette. == References == Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about dogs Category:1959 movies Category:English-language movies Category:Disney movies
title: The Shaggy Dog (1959 movie)
